original_text: And they set in it four rows of stones. A row of sardius, topaz, and carbuncle was the first row;
korean_text: 그것에 네 줄 보석을 물렸으니 곧 홍보석 황옥 녹주옥이 첫 줄이요

sentences.original_text: And they set in it four rows of stones.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그것에 보석 네 줄을 세웠고,

sentences.original_text: A row of sardius, topaz, and carbuncle was the first row;
sentences.korean_translation: 호박, 황옥, 그리고 녹주석으로 된 첫째 줄이었으니;
